summary: 1.  MY CAR HAD IGNITION SWITCH FAILURE.  THERE IS A RECALL ON IGNITION SWITCH FAILURES FOR THE YEAR/MAKE/MODEL OF MY CAR.  WHEN I CONTACTED THE MANUFACTURER THEY SAID THE RECALL DOESN'T APPLY TO MY VIN.  2.  DRIVERS DOOR WINDOW REGISTER HAS FAILED.  MANY OWNERS OF SIMILAR VEHICLES HAVE REPORTED SAME.
